## RecordClass type

A class that act as wrapper for record properties

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RecordClass<T> = {
    new (props: T): RecordInstance<T>;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [RecordInstance](./paratype.recordinstance.md)
